page.description: Reorders the items in a List by shifting the selected rows in the specified direction.

argument.name: UXListName
argument.description: The name of the List control.

argument.name: direction
argument.description: The direction to move the selected rows. Direction can be one of the following:

item.name: top
item.description: Move the selected rows to the top of the List.

item.name: up
item.description: Move the selected rows up one row in the List.

item.name: down
item.description: Move the selected rows down one row in the List.

item.name: bottom
item.description: Move the selected rows to the bottom of the List.
